attributes.action: Discuss The Possibility of Privatising the Royal Family & raise public funds.
attributes.additional_details:
The following quote from The Sun Newspaper tells us:

“THE Royal Family is worth a staggering £44.5billion — and brings in a further £26.4billion to Britain’s economy, a major study claims. And if it was sold off as a business, it would be worth more than Tesco and Marks & Spencer COMBINED.The total value includes £18.1billion of assets, such as the Crown jewels, the art in the Royal Collection, palaces and the Crown Estate.”
attributes.background: As a British citizen I feel it is my duty to help the Government develop policies that can help the British people, especially in this time of spending cuts that affect the majority of the population negatively.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 
The UK Government and Parliament doesn't have the power to privatise individuals or families.
